GSD.description:
f2fs: fix to do sanity check for inline inode

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.121 by commit efdefbe8b7564602ab446474788225a1f2a323b5. For more details please see the references link.
